column1: Offices shutting because we are pre-empting the levels of sickness/ self isolation amongst cleaning staff - because it compromises infection control . This isn’t services that are directly involved in coronavirus , it’s the core functions of local authorities .

Offices shutting because we are pre-empting the levels of sickness/ self isolation amongst cleaning staff - because it compromises infection control . This isn’t services that are directly involved in coronavirus , it’s the core functions of local authorities .
